DataElement.preferredName: Patient Primary Refractory Disease Conclusion Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date related to a person who receives medical attention with judgment reached after consideration occurring first in time with any abnormal condition not responding to treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention with judgment reached after consideration occurring first in time with any adnormal condition not responding to treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Primary Refractory Disease or Disorder Conclusion
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.:Refractory; not responding to treatment.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:A position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration.

Concepts.definition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
A position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
